Workflow.Name: DEPRECATED | SETUP REQUIRED | Admin | Find and disable flows that leverage certain connectors
Workflow.Description:
This Flow looks for certain unauthorised connectors and disables Flows that use those connectors.
Consider using DLP Policies, and blocking connectors instead.

LocalizedName.description: DEPRECATED | SETUP REQUIRED | Admin | Find and disable flows that leverage certain connectors

Description.description:
This Flow looks for certain unauthorised connectors and disables Flows that use those connectors.
Consider using DLP Policies, and blocking connectors instead.
